server-is-busy: Server is busy. Please try again later
you-do-not-have-permission-to-access-thi: You do not have permission to access this feature
invalid-access-token: Incorrect authentication information please log in again

registered-successfully: User registration successful. Please login to continue.
the-path-you-are-trying-to-access-is-inv: The path you are trying to access is invalid
error-uploading-file: Error uploading file, please try another file
invalid-image-type: Invalid image type, only JPG, PNG, GIF files are supported
file-too-large: File too large, only supports files under 5mb in size
new-password-same-as-old-password: You cannot set a new password that is the same as the old password
change-password-successfully: Password changed successfully, please log in again to continue
username-must-be-between-5-and-30-charac: Username must be between 5 and 30 characters
username-must-start-with-a-lowercase-let: Username must start with a lowercase letter and contain only lowercase letters and numbers
password-must-be-between-6-and-30-charac: Password must be between 6 and 30 characters
do-not-set-the-same-password-as-the-old-: Do not set the same password as the old one
first-name-must-be-between-2-and-30-char: First name must be between 2 and 30 characters
first-name-must-contain-only-letters-and: First name must contain only letters and spaces
last-name-must-be-between-2-and-30-chara: Last name must be between 2 and 30 characters
last-name-must-contain-only-letters-and-: Last name must contain only letters and spaces
date-of-birth-cannot-be-null: Date of birth cannot be null
date-of-birth-must-be-in-the-past: Date of birth must be in the past
hod-role-is-invalid: Head of department role is invalid
the-hod-has-a-department: The head of department has a department
Accounts are provided by the administrat: Accounts are provided by the administrator only
AreYouSureLogout: Are you sure you want to logout?
